Each system was optimized to a residual force of 0.005 Å eV −1. All optimizations for crystal and molecular systems were performed at the Γ-point. The molecular systems were put in a cubic unit cell with a side of 25 Å, which ensures no impact due to interactions with periodic images. The results were analyzed and visualized with in-house Python scripts.
